Function.name: maximize

args.name: duration
args.desc: The duration of the window animation.

args.name: margin
args.desc: The margin to use for the window.

Function.desc: Maximizes the focused window, using the provided margin or a default margin if none is provided.

Function.name: resize

args.name: newSize
args.desc: The new size to resize the window to. If not provided, the window is maximized.

args.name: duration
args.desc: The duration of the window animation.

Function.desc: Resizes the focused window to the provided size or maximizes it if no size is provided.

Function.name: alignTop
Function.desc: Aligns the focused window to the top of the screen.

Function.name: splitLeft

args.name: width
args.desc: The percentage of the screen width to use for the window.

Function.desc: Splits the screen to the left, with the focused window taking up the left portion of the screen.

Function.name: splitRight

args.name: width
args.desc: The percentage of the screen width to use for the window.

Function.desc: Splits the screen to the right, with the focused window taking up the right portion of the screen.

desc: A Spoon for managing window sizes and positions.
doc:
A Spoon for managing window sizes and positions. Supports maximizing windows to the screen, aligning windows to the top, and splitting the screen to the left or right.

Download: [https://github.com/luizclaudiomoreira/MyWindowManager.spoon](https://github.com/luizclaudiomoreira/MyWindowManager.spoon)
name: MyWindowManager
stripped_doc:
A Spoon for managing window sizes and positions. Supports maximizing windows to the screen, aligning windows to the top, and splitting the screen to the left or right.

Download: [https://github.com/luizclaudiomoreira/MyWindowManager.spoon](https://github.com/luizclaudiomoreira/MyWindowManager.spoon)
